title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A creamy pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
instructions: Boil pasta. Fry pancetta. Mix with eggs and cheese. Combine and serve.

title: Chicken Curry
summary: A flavorful curry made with tender chicken and aromatic spices.
instructions: Cook onion and garlic. Add chicken and curry powder. Pour coconut milk and simmer.
